log_spawn.label: Print chat message on (de)spawn
log_spawn.tooltip: Print an echo message when a Fate spawns and despawns

alert_all.label: Alert for all Fates
alert_all.tooltip: Play a sound effect when any fate spawns

alert_azurite.label: Alert for Azurite Demiatma Fate
alert_azurite.tooltip: Play a sound effect when a fate that drops the Azurite Demiatma spawns
